Superstar Teacher Toolbox

Implementing Digital Pedagogy

2.5 Learning to Learn

The goal of digital teaching is to give students the ability to learn on their own, using a variety of methods to promote a lasting and upbeat attitude towards learning along with all the effort that goes with it.

  • Social & Collaborative Learning
  • Problem-solving & Thinking
  • Play and Creativeness
  • Assessment and Feedback
  • Learning to Learn
